Features.title: Fully Manage, Your Gold and Jewellery Stores' Financial Accounting
options: Assign employees and vendors and keep track of their activity records
Advanced reports informing you of the extent of performance of each employee and vendor according to the powers assigned to him
Reports showing sales achieved by each seller separately

Features.title: Monitor vendors and store employees performance
options: Assign employees and vendors and keep track of their activity records
Advanced reports informing you of the extent of performance of each employee and vendor according to the powers assigned to him
Reports showing sales achieved by each seller separately

Features.title: Furniture design and implementation
options: Calculate the net income for each period through the profit and loss report
View sales reports by items to learn about the best-selling jewellery and gold jewellery
Make a periodic inventory of your stock of products through the inventory report. You can also benefit from many other reports that cover all aspects of your business.
Follow up the daily reports that are created automatically for any financial operations or procedures that take place inside the store
A complete network of accounts displaying all balances of the store's accounts with all movements within each account
Final accounting reports determining the financial position of the shop at the end of the year.

Features.title: Adjust it to suit you
options: Choose the right module for you, whether it is gold by weight, gold by piece or diamond by piece, add your company logo. also you can freely adjust the site's colours and identity to match your brand identity
